void checkSignature(ALLOC)(auto ref const Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) tbs_response, const AlgorithmIdentifier sig_algo, ref const Vector!ubyte signature, const X509Certificate cert);
Does not use trusted roots

Throws if not trusted

void checkSignature(ALLOC)(auto ref const Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) tbs_response, const AlgorithmIdentifier sig_algo, ref const Vector!ubyte signature, const CertificateStore trusted_roots, ref const Vector!X509Certificate certs);
Iterates over trusted roots certificate store

throws if not trusted

void onlineCheck(shared(Tid) sender, shared(size_t) id, shared(OCSPResponse*) resp, shared(const(X509Certificate)*) issuer, shared(const(X509Certificate)*) subject, shared(const(CertificateStore)*) trusted_roots);
Checks the certificate online
